NO HIDDEN FEES Our system is designed without hidden charges. You will receive your promised ROI at the end of your investment. INSTANT INVESTMENT Create an account with our platform, make a deposit and start investing immediately. Who We Are Working together to deliver growth to your investments. We bring the right people together to challenge established thinking and drive transformation. We work with our clients to build the capabilities that enable organizations to achieve sustainable advantage. SIGN UP Build Your Team Do You Want To Be A Part Of Using your referral code in your investor dashboard, refer potential investors to our service and earn. Step 1 REGISTER AN ACCOUNT Registration takes about 2 min and is free. Your account will be active immediately MAKE A DEPOSIT The process is very simple. You can make a deposit using 9 available payment methods. ENJOY YOUR PROFITS You will receive profit accruals every 24 hours after you made your deposit. 7 days in a week. Taxation As a governance oriented investment firm, we help fund public works and services—and to build and maintain the infrastructures used in our resident country through our prompt tax filings. Trades & Stock Our traders engage in market trades conducting extensive research and observation of how financial markets perform at that certain point in time before execution. Corporate Finance We will actively manage your portfolio to ensure it remains appropriate for the ever-changing conditions in the global economy and financial markets. Risk Managment We ensure that returns are satisfactory and consistent with the levels of risk being taken and also have regular peer reviews for investment suitability. Join Now An investment in knowledge Ethical Investments We have a dedicated team for clients who want 100% ethical and sustainable investment management. Professional Data Analysis We have invested in our ability to monitor how your investments perform. Sophisticated, market-leading software enables us do this. Business Strategy Our diversified investment strategy combines different assets and can be one of the best ways to preserve and enhance wealth over the long term. thought: The extracted text from the website contains several red flags that align with characteristics of scam websites: 1. It offers unusually high profits, such as "5% PROFIT AFTER 24 HOURS" and "25% PROFIT AFTER 5 DAYS," which seems unrealistic and too good to be true. 2. The site mentions a referral system with instant commissions which targets human psychological weaknesses by incentivizing users to bring more people into the scheme. 3. There are claims of 24/7 customer support and no hidden fees, which may be an attempt to appear trustworthy. 4. The website is managing a wide variety of products, such as Crypto Trading, Gold trading, and Oil and Gas, which is not common for a single investment site. 5. The contact email provided seems generic and not appropriate for a professional investment firm (Support@max-earning). Before jumping to a conclusion, I will gather more information to confirm the legitimacy of the website.

thought: The WHOIS information indicates that the domain was recently registered and uses a privacy service to hide the owner's actual information. This could be a sign of trying to avoid detection, which is common among scam websites. Additionally, the domain registrant's information is associated with a proxy organization rather than the actual business, which raises suspicion. Given the information from the WHOIS data and the extracted text, I believe I have enough evidence to conclude that the website is likely a scam. I now know the final answer. The URL https://max-earning.com/ is a scam website.

observation.reason: The website offers unusually high profits that are unrealistic. There is a referral system with instant commissions, which is a common tactic used by scam sites to exploit human psychological weaknesses. The contact information provided is generic and not suitable for a legitimate investment firm. The WHOIS information shows recent registration and use of privacy services to hide owner details, which is common for scam websites.
